problem:
inductive Tree : Type
| leaf : Tree
| node (l : Tree) (v : Int) (r : Tree) : Tree

open Tree

-- 定义 treeReverse 函数
def treeReverse : Tree → Tree
| leaf => leaf
| node l v r => node (treeReverse r) v (treeReverse l)

-- 定义一个定理，证明 treeReverse 是单射的
theorem treeReverse_inj (t1 t2 : Tree) : treeReverse t1 = treeReverse t2 → t1 = t2 := by
